mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Result ( logicScore, claScore, interviewId, suggestion, impAnswer, simScore, questionId ) VALUES ( #{logicScore}, #{claScore}, #{interviewId}, #{suggestion}, #{impAnswer}, #{simScore}, #{questionId} )
mapper.select: SELECT resultId, logicScore, simScore, claScore, createdAt, interviewId, suggestion, impAnswer, questionId FROM Result WHERE interviewId = #{interviewId}

SELECT r.interviewId, AVG(r.simScore) AS simScore, AVG(r.logicScore) AS logicScore, AVG(r.claScore) AS claScore, MAX(r.createdAt) AS createdAt FROM Result r JOIN Interview i ON r.interviewId = i.interviewId WHERE i.userId = #{userId} GROUP BY r.interviewId ORDER BY MAX(r.createdAt) DESC
